org.framed.orm.ui.editor

Class ORMMultiPageEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager
      • org.eclipse.ui.part.WorkbenchPart
        • org.eclipse.ui.part.EditorPart
          • org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart
            • org.framed.orm.ui.editor.ORMMultiPageEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension, org.eclipse.gef.commands.CommandStackListener, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IPageChangeProvider, org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart, org.eclipse.ui.ISaveablePart, org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart2, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart3, org.eclipse.ui.part.IWorkbenchPartOrientation

    public class ORMMultiPageEditor
extends org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart
implements org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener, org.eclipse.gef.commands.CommandStackListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener
    This MultiPageEditorPart has as pages the behaviour ORMGraphicalEditor and the data ORMGraphicalEditor.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski, Lars Sch√ºtze

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart

        PROP_DIRTY, PROP_INPUT

      • Fields inherited from interface org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart

        PROP_TITLE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ORMMultiPageEditor()
      The constructor of this class, where MultiPageEditorPart.MultiPageEditorPart() is called, inputFilename and changeNotifier are initialized and a listener to the model resources is added.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commandStackChanged(java.util.EventObject event)
      Called when the CommandStack state of the active editor has changed.
      void createCustomTitleForEditor(java.lang.Object model)
      This method creates a custom title for this editor out of resource file name, the genral model element term and the specific model/Type element name of the model element which is the content of the viewer of data/behaviour ORMGraphicalEditor.
      void doSave(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      The implementation of the ORMMultiPageEditor saves the all editor, which work on the same input resource and are registered through a page.
      void doSaveAs()
      Does at the moment nothing, because GraphicalEditor.doSaveAs() isn't implemented.
      ORMGraphicalEditor getBehaviorEditor()
      A getter for behaviour editor, which registered by this editor.
      ORMGraphicalEditor getDataEditor()
      A getter for data editor, which registered by this editor.
      java.lang.String getInputFileName()
      A getter for name of input resource file.
      void init(org.eclipse.ui.IEditorSite site, org.eclipse.ui.IEditorInput editorInput)
      The implementation of the ORMMultiPageEditor tests if the editor input is from type IFileEditorInput, adds a selection listener and initializes the input resource.
      boolean isSaveAsAllowed()
      At the moment this method returns always true, because SaveAs functionalty isn't implemented.
      void resourceChanged(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeEvent event)
      Closes all project files on project close.
      void selectionChanged(org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart part, org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection)
      This method enables select action for the active editor.
      void setContents(java.lang.Object obj)
      Sets the object obj as content in the behavior editor and data editor
      void setEditorChangeNotifier(EditorChangeNotifier changeNotifier)
      A setter for the EditorChangeNotifier of this editor.
      void setTitleImage(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image titleImage)
